types.html:
d'un iota

  1. not a bit, not at all (used with a negation to express lack of change)
    • 2003, Laurent Genefort, La Mécanique du talion, →ISBN:
      En vérité, sa haine n'avait pas faibli d'un iota.
      In truth, his/her hatred had not diminished in the slightest.
trans: not a bit, not at all

title: d'un iota
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /d‿œ̃ jɔ.ta/
